lines.text:
[as he keeps shooting a man he has already killed]
Why? Because it feels so goddamn good!
You guys are definitely on my shit list!

Listen. The church cuts off the feet, fingers, any other goddamn thing from the saints, don't they? Well, what the hell? Alfredo's our saint. He's the saint of our money, and I'm gonna borrow a piece of him.
I've been no place I wanna go back to, that's for damn sure.
I can smell shit 100 miles away... sometimes closer.
I will pay one million dollars. Bring me the head of Alfredo Garcia!
Nobody loses all the time.
You wanna stay here with him?

[after a shootout]
Am I still gonna get paid?

[pulling out a gun]
Yeah, you'll get paid.
Come on, Al. We're going home.
Hell, I wasn't trying to hit them, you know
I know you weren't.
I used to shoot a lot of pistols when I was in the army.
You're a nice gringo. You didn't have a thing to do in the army anyways.
You'd be surprised, honey.
There ain't nothing sacred about a hole in the ground or the man that's in it. Or you. Or me.
Please, drink with me. I am a very happy man.
Nah, I've got nothing to celebrate.
Quien es el padre? Who is the father?
I've been down this road before, and you don't know the way.
Don't you look at me with your Goddamn fucking eyes!

[i'll have]
a double bourbon with a champagne back, none of your tijano bullshit, and fuck off.
I'm gonna nail you, somewhere I'm gonna nail you. You're up there. You're up there you son of a... I'm gonna find you. Damn your eyes! Lemme see that big station wagon.
I've killed people... and worse, a whole lot worse.
You ought to be drunk in Fresno, California. This place is a palace.
